page.shortlink: UX Repeating Sections Show label rule
page.description: Specify if labels should be shown for fields in the first repeated row or all rows.

section.description: The *[ui:Show label rule]* defines where labels for fields in the repeating section should be displayed. In most uses cases, you will set the label position for fields in a repeating section to render 'Above' the field with the *[ui:Show label rule]* set to 'First Row Only'.

item.name: First Row Only
item.description: Show field labels only in the first row.

item.name: All rows
item.description: Show field labels in every row.
